name: Products Compare for WooCommerce
author: BeRocket

sections.description:
Allows customers to compare products. Your customers can make better buying decisions on products they want and need. Products Compare for WooCommerce allows users to firstly add products to a compare list, then at the click of a mouse the chosen products can be viewed in a comparison table.

Features:

✅ Compare Page
✅ Add to compare button
✅ Widget with selected products to compare
✅ Select attributes for compare
✅ Customization for buttons and compare page
✅ Set custom text on buttons
✅ Different type of widget

Features in Version 3.5:

✅ Display widget as toolbar on the bottom
✅ Fast compare on popup
✅ Compare by custom taxonomy
✅ Advanced customization
✅ AddThis buttons on compare page
✅ Show only difference or show all button
✅ Custom URL for compare page

Plugin Links:

Demo
Docs

Plugin video

Compatibility with WooCommerce plugins

Products Compare for WooCommerce has been tested and compatibility is certain with the following WooCommerce plugins that you can add to your site:

🔸 Load More Products for WooCommerce
🔸 Grid/List View for WooCommerce
🔸 Product Preview for WooCommerce
🔸 Splash Popup for WooCommerce
🔸 Terms and Conditions Popup for WooCommerce
🔸 Wishlist and Waitlist for WooCommerce
sections.installation:
Important: First of all, you have to download and activate WooCommerce plugin, because without it Products Compare for WooCommerce cannot work.

  1. Unzip the downloaded .zip file.
  2. Upload the Products Compare for WooCommerce folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate Products Compare for WooCommerce from Plugins page

Configuration

Products Compare for WooCommerce will add a new sub-menu item called “Products Compare” in “WooCommerce” menu. There you will be able to access plugin settings page.
sections.faq:
Is it compatible with all WordPress themes?

Compatibility with all themes is impossible, because they are too many, but generally if themes are developed according to WordPress and WooCommerce guidelines, BeRocket plugins are compatible with them.

How can I get support if my WooCommerce plugin is not working?

If you have problems with our plugins or something is not working as it should, first follow this preliminary steps:

  • Test the plugin with a WordPress default theme, to be sure that the error is not caused by the theme you are currently using.
  • Deactivate all plugins you are using and check if the problem is still occurring.
  • Ensure that your plugin version, your theme version and your WordPress and WooCommerce version (if required) are updated and that the problem you are experiencing has not already been solved in a later plugin update.

If none of the previous listed actions helps you solve the problem, then, submit a ticket in the forum and describe your problem accurately, specify WordPress and WooCommerce versions you are using and any other information that might help us solve your problem as quickly as possible. Thanks!

short_description: Allow your users to compare products of your shop by attributes and price.
